animeTitle: Mahou no Tenshi Creamy Mami: Long Goodbye
animeDescription: Shingo is planning the film "A Story of Two Worlds" starring Megumi. Yuu's transformation into Creamy Mami is happening without her wanting it. She is asked to star in the film too. But the magic doesn't last...
animeRelated: ['Mahou no Tenshi Creamy Mami', 'Mahou no Tenshi Creamy Mami: Eien no Once More', 'Mahou no Princess Minky Momo vs. Mahou no Tenshi Creamy Mami', 'Mahou no Tenshi Creamy Mami: Zutto Kitto Motto']
